title: Telegram Stats
lists: ["Telegram is one of the most widely used social media platforms, with over 900 million monthly active users, a sharp increase of 12.5% as of the previous year. It is expected to cross the 1 Billion market by the end of 2024.", "Telegram generated $45 million in 2023 with the Premium services as the primary revenue stream.","More than 2.5 million users sign up on Telegram daily, making it one of the fastest-growing social media apps.", "About 15 million messages are sent daily on Telegram, and the engagement rate is over 55%, which makes it ideal for marketing.", "Telegram recorded approximately $6.1 million in revenue from in-app purchases worldwide in February 2024."]
